recordTypes.name: Capacity Assurance Review
recordTypes.description: Use this form to submit a Capacity Assurance Request to WEP to determine if the sewer system (both treatment plant and collection system) have the capacity to serve a proposed project.

recordTypes.name: Residential Water Heater Replacement Permit
recordTypes.description:
Use this application for Water Heater Installation/Replacement Permits.   All applications MUST include a completed Water Heater Checklist and Photos of each water heater with the placard attached.   

Submit one application per address.

recordTypes.name: Signing Up For An Account
recordTypes.description: A detailed walkthrough on signing up for an account

recordTypes.name: Signing Into Your Account
recordTypes.description: Step-by-step instructions on signing into your account securely

recordTypes.name: Sewer Unit Charge Inquiries
recordTypes.description: Complete this form if you have questions or concerns regarding the "County Sewer" charge on your County tax bill.

recordTypes.name: Annual Plumbers License and Registration
recordTypes.description: Use the application to submit the application for annual registration as a Master's (Master's Active, Master's Inactive, Master's Inactive - Journeyman), Journeyman, or Apprentice plumber.  This application is only for Master's and Journeyman who have already passed the corresponding competency exams.

recordTypes.name: Applying for a Permit
recordTypes.description: Walk through the process of completing an application

recordTypes.name: Plumber Certification Exam Application
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply to take the competency exam to be licensed as a Master or Journeyman Plumber.

recordTypes.name: Paying Fees
recordTypes.description: A road map for the payment process

recordTypes.name: Application Guests
recordTypes.description: How to easily add or remove a guest from your application

recordTypes.name: Waste Hauler Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Disposal/Solid Waste Hauler License in the County of Onondaga, NY

recordTypes.name: Update Current Waste Hauler Permit
recordTypes.description: Add or remove vehicles or waste types to your current Waste Hauler Permit.

recordTypes.name: Application Management
recordTypes.description: Effectively manage and track the status of drafts and applications, review submissions, and leave comments

recordTypes.name: Changes Requested
recordTypes.description: Updating your application when changes have been requested

recordTypes.name: Inspections
recordTypes.description: How to request an inspection or view scheduled and past inspections

recordTypes.name: Viewing and Printing Documents
recordTypes.description: Guide to viewing and printing issued documents

categories.name: Help Guide
categories.content:
Welcome to the Help Guide
Need assistance navigating WEP's new application portal? You're in the right place. The guides on this page are designed to provide clear, step-by-step instructions and answer common questions.
